Introduce a smart vacuum cleaner that can be controlled remotely using a mobile app. It can be programmed to clean at specific times, and can be stopped and started remotely. The app can also be used to schedulees, and can be customized to suit individual preferences.

Develop a vacuum cleaner that uses a powerful suction to remove dirt and debris from hard floors and carpets. The cleaner can be equipped with a HEPA filter to remove allergens and other particles from the air.
Create a vacuum cleaner that is designed to clean up after pets. It can be equipped with a special brush roll that is designed to remove pet hair and debris from hard floors and carpets.
Introduce a vacuum cleaner that is designed to be lightweight and easy to. It can be carried around easily, and can be used to clean hard floors and carpets in a variety of settings.

Develop a vacuum cleaner that is designed to be eco-friendly. It can be powered by a rechargeable battery, and can be equipped with a filter that is designed to trap and remove pollutants from the air.
